original: Eklöf, Josef Fredrik Lennart, direktör, Jönköping, f. 8/2/15 i Örebro. G. 39 m. Magda Gavelli. Barn: Christer f. 41, Marianne 45. — Realex., hand:-gymn., Leiicester Col’l. of Techn. Res. t. Engl., Frankr., Tyskl. 33:-34, t. USA 46. Dir. i A-B Löfsiko-Nordsko fr. 46. Led. av -styr. i A-B Löfs<ko-Nordsko, Lager sons Skos-alonger A-B o. A-B Skodon. Hobby: tennis,
translated: Eklöf, Josef Fredrik Lennart, director, Jönköping, b. 8/2/15 in Örebro. Married in 1939 to Magda Gavelli, they have two children: Christer, born in 1941, and Marianne, born in 1945. Education: Realexamen (secondary education), commercial school, studied at Leicester College of Technology in England, France, Germany in 1933-1934 and in the USA in 1946. Director of A-B Löfsiko-Nordsko from 1946. Member of the board of directors for A-B Löfs<ko-Nordsko, Lager sons Skos-alonger A-B and A-B Skodon. Hobby: tennis.
